name: Md. Rabiul Islam
title: Supply Chain Manager & Procurement Specialist
subtitle: I'm a passionate Supply Chain Leader, Strategic Procurement Expert, Logistics Optimizer
location: Block# L, Road# 11, House# 15, South Banasree, Khilgaon, Dhaka, Bangladesh

about.description: Accomplished Supply Chain Manager at Akij Group, renowned for optimizing procurement KPIs and resolving intricate shipping bottlenecks. Adept in import sourcing, logistics, and financial management, consistently driving cost efficiencies. Skilled in seamless coordination across departments for timely deliveries, inventory optimization, and fostering robust supplier relationships. Backed by a Master's in Procurement & Supply Management and a suite of certifications, offer a proven blend of strategic insight and operational excellence for sustained organizational success.
about.objective: To lead and optimize supply chain operations by leveraging expertise in procurement, logistics, and strategic leadership.
highlights: 15+ years of progressive experience in supply chain management and procurement
Proven track record of optimizing procurement KPIs and resolving shipping bottlenecks
Master's in Procurement & Supply Management with multiple international certifications
Expert in import sourcing, logistics optimization, and financial management
Strong background in supplier relationship management and regulatory compliance
Data-driven approach to solving complex supply chain challenges
Cross-functional coordination across Production, Sales, and Finance departments
